rememberModifiedComment() {\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里应该：\n            // 1. 保存到数据库\n            // 2. 更新缓存\n            // 3. 发送通知\n            \n            System.out.println("评论更改已保存到系统");\n            System.out.println("修改详情: " + selectedFeedback);\n            \n            // 重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 取消操作。\n     * 处理机构操作员取消操作的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果取消成功则返回true\n     */\n    public boolean cancelOperation() {\n        isOperationCancelled = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已取消");\n        \n        // 如果评论已被修改但未确认，恢复原始评论\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // System.out.println("ID\\t创建时间\\t\\t\\t评论预览");\n        System.out.println("------------------------------------------------------------------------");\n        \n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = commentPreview = commentPreview.substring(0, 27) + "...";\n            }\n            \n            System.out.printf("%-6d %-20s %-30s%n",\n                feedback.getFeedbackId(),\n                feedback.getCreatedAt().toString().substring(0, 16),\n                commentPreview);\n        }\n        System.out.println();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n (input.isEmpty()) {\n                System.err.println("错误：评论内容不能为空");\n                attempts++;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            // 检查输入长度\n            if System.out.println("评论编辑完成，等待验证...");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证数据并请求确认。\n     * 系统验证输入的数据并请求用户确认更改。\n     * @return 如果验证通过且用户准备确认则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step6_ValidateAndRequestConfirmation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤6：验证和确认请求 ===");\n        \n        // 自动验证已在editComment方法中完成\n        // 这里显示确认请求\n        \n        Feedback selectedFeedback = commentService.getSelectedFeedback();\n        if (selectedFeedback == null || !selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有待确认的评论修改");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论修改验证通过！");\n        System.out.println("请确认是否保存以下更改:");\n        System.out.println("评论ID: " + selectedFeedback.getFeedbackId());\n        System.out.println("修改时间: " + selectedFeedback.getLastModifiedAt());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 请求用户确认\n        String confirmation = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (confirmation == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.print("确认保存更改吗？(yes/no/cancel): ");\n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n            \n            if (input.equals("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("no")) {\n                System.out.println("用户选择不保存更改");\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("yes")) {\n                confirmation = input;\n            } else {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入 yes, no 或 cancel");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (confirmation == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("确认收到，准备保存更改...");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 系统确认操作并保存更改。\n     */\n    private void step7_ConfirmOperation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤7：确认操作 ===");\n        \n        boolean success = commentService.confirmOperation();\n        if (!success) {\n            System.err.println("操作确认失败");\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("操作确认成功");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：完成流程。\n     * 记住已更改的评论并通知系统。\n     */\n    private void step8_CompleteProcess() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤8：完成流程 ===");\n        \n        // 检查操作是否已确认\n System.out.println("评论修改未完成或未确认");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 关闭用户界面，释放资源。\n     */\n    public void close() {\n        if (scanner != null) {\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n private AgencyOperator currentOperator;\n    private Site selectedSite;\n    private Feedback selectedFeedback;\n    private boolean isOperationConfirmed;\n    private boolean isOperationCancelled;\n CommentModificationService(AgencyOperator operator) {\n        if (operator == null) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员不能为空");\n        }\n        if (!operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员必须已登录才能执行评论修改操作");\n        }\n        this.currentOperator = operator;\n        this.selectedSite = null;\n        this.selectedFeedback = null;\n sites) {\n            if (site.getSiteId() == siteId) {\n                selectedSite = site;\n                System.out.println("已选择站点: " + site.getSiteName());\n                return true;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + siteId + " 的站点");\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤2和3：获取站点反馈列表并选择反馈。\n     * 上传并显示站点的反馈，然后选择其中一个反馈。\n     * @param feedbackId 要选择的反馈ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectFeedback(int feedbackId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择站点\n        if (selectedSite == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 从站点获取反馈列表\n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = selectedSite.getFeedbacks();\n        if (feedbacks.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：该站点没有反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 查找指定ID的反馈\n        Feedback feedback = selectedSite.findFeedbackById(feedbackId);\n        if (feedback == + feedback);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：显示编辑表单并编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n     * @param newComment 新的评论内容\n     * @return 如果编辑成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean editComment(String newComment) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法编辑评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤6：验证输入的数据\n        if (!validateCommentData(newComment)) {\n            // 数据无效，激活Errored用例\n            handleErroredCase("评论数据无效或不足");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 保存原始评论以便在取消时恢复\n        String originalComment = selectedFeedback.getComment();\n        \n        // 更新评论内容\n        boolean isChanged = selectedFeedback.setComment(newComment);\n        if (!isChanged) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论内容未改变");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论已更新，等待确认...");\n        System.out.println("原始评论: " + originalComment);\n        System.out.println("新评论: " + newComment);\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证评论数据。\n     * 检查评论是否有效和充足。\n     * @param comment 要验证的评论\n     * @return 如果评论有效则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean validateCommentData(String comment) {\n        if (comment == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String trimmedComment = comment.trim();\n        if (trimmedComment.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空或只包含空白字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论长度限制\n        if (trimmedComment.length() > 1000) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论长度不能超过1000个字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否包含非法字符（示例检查）\n        if (trimmedComment.contains("<script>") || trimmedComment.contains("</script>")) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论包含潜在的安全风险内容");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：处理错误情况，激活Errored用例。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会记录错误、发送通知或执行其他错误处理逻辑。\n     * @param errorMessage 错误消息\n     */\n    private void handleErroredCase(String errorMessage) {\n        System.err.println("激活Errored用例: " + errorMessage);\n        // 在实际应用中，这里可能会：\n        // 1. 记录错误日志\n        // 2. 发送错误通知\n        // 3. 回滚任何未提交的更改\n        // 4. 重置服务状态\n        resetSelection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 用户确认要保存评论更改。\n     * @return 如果确认成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean confirmOperation() {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法确认操作");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有待确认的评论修改");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否已被修改\n        if (!selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论未被修改，无需确认");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        isOperationConfirmed = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已确认，正在保存评论更改...");\n        \n        // 步骤8：记住已更改的评论\n        rememberModifiedComment();\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：记住已更改的评论。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会将更改持久化到数据库或文件系统。\n     */\n    private void rememberModifiedComment() {\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里应该：\n            // 1. 保存到数据库\n            // 2. 更新缓存\n            // 3. 发送通知\n            \n            System.out.println("评论更改已保存到系统");\n            System.out.println("修改详情: " + selectedFeedback);\n            \n            // 重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 取消操作。\n     * 处理机构操作员取消操作的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果取消成功则返回true\n     */\n    public boolean cancelOperation() {\n        isOperationCancelled = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已取消");\n        \n        // 如果评论已被修改但未确认，恢复原始评论\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里可能需要从备份中恢复原始评论\n            System.out.println("已恢复原始评论");\n            // 注意：由于我们未保存原始评论，这里只是重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n        \n        resetSelection();\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查服务器连接状态。\n     * 处理服务器连接中断的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果服务器连接正常则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean checkServerConnection() {\n        isServerConnected = currentOperator.checkServerConnection();\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断");\n            resetSelection();\n        }\n        return isServerConnected;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 重置当前选择。\n     * 在操作完成、取消或错误时调用。\n     */\n    private void resetSelection() {\n        selectedSite = null;\n        selectedFeedback = null;\n        isOperationConfirmed = false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取当前选择的站点。\n     * @return 当前选择的站点，如果未选择则返回null\n     */\n    public Site getSelectedSite() {\n        return selectedSite;\n UserInterface类提供控制台用户界面，引导用户完成评论修改的完整流程。\n * 按照用例描述的事件流程，处理站点选择、反馈选择、评论编辑和确认等步骤。\n * 包含错误处理、输入验证和用户友好的交互提示。\n */\npublic class UserInterface {\n    private Scanner scanner;\n    private AgencyOperator currentOperator;\n    private CommentModificationService commentService;\n    private List<Site> availableSites;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，初始化用户界面。\n     * @param operator 当前操作员，必须已登录\n     * @param sites 可用的站点列表\n     */\n    public UserInterface(AgencyOperator operator, List<Site> sites) {\n        this.scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n        this.currentOperator = operator;\n        this.availableSites = sites;\n        \n        // 验证操作员权限\n        if (operator == null || !operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("操作员必须已登录才能使用评论修改功能");\n        }\n        \n        // 初始化评论修改服务\n        this.commentService = new CommentModificationService(operator);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 主菜单入口，启动评论修改流程。\n     * 遵循用例描述的事件流程顺序。\n     */\n    public void startModificationProcess() {\n        System.out.println("====== 评论修改系统 ======");\n        System.out.println("欢迎，" + currentOperator.getOperatorName());\n        System.out.println("当前操作员ID: " + currentOperator.getOperatorId());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!commentService.checkServerConnection()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：无法连接到服务器，请检查网络连接后重试");\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        try {\n            // 按照用例流程执行\n            boolean continueProcess = true;\n            \n            // 步骤1：查看站点列表并选择站点\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                continueProcess = step1_ViewAndSelectSite();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤2和3：显示反馈并选择反馈\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                continueProcess = step2and3_DisplayAndSelectFeedback();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤4和5：编辑评论\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                continueProcess = step4and5_EditComment();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤6：验证数据并请求确认\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                continueProcess = step6_ValidateAndRequestConfirmation();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤7：确认操作\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                step7_ConfirmOperation();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤8：完成流程\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                step8_CompleteProcess();\n            }\n            \n            // 检查是否取消操作\n            if (commentService.isOperationCancelled()) {\n                System.out.println("操作已被用户取消");\n            }\n            \n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            System.err.println("发生意外错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            e.printStackTrace();\n        } finally {\n            System.out.println("====== 评论修改流程结束 ======");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤1：查看站点列表并选择站点。\n     * 模拟从SearchSite用例获取站点列表。\n     * @return 如果成功选择站点则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step1_ViewAndSelectSite() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤1：选择站点 ===");\n        \n        // 显示可用站点列表\n        displaySiteList();\n        \n        // 如果站点列表为空，无法继续\n        if (availableSites.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有可用的站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 获取用户输入的站点ID\n        Integer siteId = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (siteId == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            try {\n                System.out.print("请输入要选择的站点ID (输入\'cancel\'取消操作): ");\n                String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n                \n                // 检查用户是否取消操作\n                if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n                    commentService.cancelOperation();\n                    return false;\n                }\n                \n                // 验证输入是否为数字\n                siteId = Integer.parseInt(input);\n                \n                // 尝试选择站点\n                boolean success = commentService.selectSite(availableSites, siteId);\n                if (!success) {\n                    System.err.println("站点选择失败，请重试");\n                    siteId = null;\n                    attempts++;\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入有效的数字ID");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (siteId == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("站点选择成功");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 显示可用站点列表。\n     */\n    private void displaySiteList() {\n        System.out.println("可用站点列表:");\n        System.out.println("ID\\t名称\\t\\t反馈数");\n        System.out.println("--------------------------------");\n        \n        for (Site site : availableSites) {\n            System.out.printf("%-6d %-15s %-3d%n", \n                site.getSiteId(), \n                site.getSiteName(), \n                site.getFeedbacks().size());\n        }\n        System.out.println();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤2和3：显示反馈并选择反馈。\n     * 上传并显示站点的反馈，然后选择其中一个反馈。\n     * @return 如果成功选择反馈则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step2and3_DisplayAndSelectFeedback() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤2和3：选择反馈 ===");\n        \n        Site selectedSite = commentService.getSelectedSite();\n        if (selectedSite == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：未选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 显示站点的反馈列表\n        displayFeedbackList(selectedSite);\n        \n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = selectedSite.getFeedbacks();\n        if (feedbacks.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：该站点没有可用的反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 获取用户输入的反馈ID\n        Integer feedbackId = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (feedbackId == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            try {\n                System.out.print("请输入要编辑的反馈ID (输入\'cancel\'取消操作): ");\n                String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n                \n                // 检查用户是否取消操作\n                if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n                    commentService.cancelOperation();\n                    return false;\n                }\n                \n                // 验证输入是否为数字\n                feedbackId = Integer.parseInt(input);\n                \n                // 尝试选择反馈\n                boolean success = commentService.selectFeedback(feedbackId);\n                if (!success) {\n                    System.err.println("反馈选择失败，请重试");\n                    feedbackId = null;\n                    attempts++;\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入有效的数字ID");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (feedbackId == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("反馈选择成功");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 显示站点的反馈列表。\n     * @param site 要显示反馈的站点\n     */\n    private void displayFeedbackList(Site site) {\n        System.out.println("站点 \\"" + site.getSiteName() + "\\" 的反馈列表:");\n        System.out.println("ID\\t创建时间\\t\\t\\t评论预览");\n        System.out.println("------------------------------------------------------------------------");\n        \n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = site.getFeedbacks();\n        for (Feedback feedback : feedbacks) {\n            String commentPreview = feedback.getComment();\n            if (commentPreview.length() > 30) {\n                commentPreview = commentPreview.substring(0, 27) + "...";\n            }\n            \n            System.out.printf("%-6d %-20s %-30s%n",\n                feedback.getFeedbackId(),\n                feedback.getCreatedAt().toString().substring(0, 16),\n                commentPreview);\n        }\n        System.out.println();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n     * @return 如果编辑成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step4and5_EditComment() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤4和5：编辑评论 ===");\n        \n        Feedback selectedFeedback = commentService.getSelectedFeedback();\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：未选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 显示当前评论\n        System.out.println("当前评论内容:");\n        System.out.println("----------------------------------------");\n        System.out.println(selectedFeedback.getComment());\n        System.out.println("----------------------------------------");\n        System.out.println("评论创建时间: " + selectedFeedback.getCreatedAt());\n        System.out.println("最后修改时间: " + selectedFeedback.getLastModifiedAt());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 获取用户输入的新评论\n        String newComment = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (newComment == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.println("请输入新的评论内容 (输入\'cancel\'取消操作):");\n            System.out.println("注意：评论不能为空，长度不能超过1000字符");\n            System.out.print("> ");\n            \n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            // 检查用户是否取消操作\n            if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            }\n            \n            // 检查输入是否为空\n            if (input.isEmpty()) {\n                System.err.println("错误：评论内容不能为空");\n                attempts++;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            // 检查输入长度\n            if (input.length() > 1000) {\n                System.err.println("错误：评论长度超过1000字符限制");\n                attempts++;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            newComment = input;\n        }\n        \n        if (newComment == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 尝试编辑评论\n        boolean success = commentService.editComment(newComment);\n        if (!success) {\n            System.err.println("评论编辑失败");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论编辑完成，等待验证...");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证数据并请求确认。\n     * 系统验证输入的数据并请求用户确认更改。\n     * @return 如果验证通过且用户准备确认则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step6_ValidateAndRequestConfirmation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤6：验证和确认请求 ===");\n        \n        // 自动验证已在editComment方法中完成\n        // 这里显示确认请求\n        \n        Feedback selectedFeedback = commentService.getSelectedFeedback();\n        if (selectedFeedback == null || !selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有待确认的评论修改");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论修改验证通过！");\n        System.out.println("请确认是否保存以下更改:");\n        System.out.println("评论ID: " + selectedFeedback.getFeedbackId());\n        System.out.println("修改时间: " + selectedFeedback.getLastModifiedAt());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 请求用户确认\n        String confirmation = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (confirmation == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.print("确认保存更改吗？(yes/no/cancel): ");\n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n            \n            if (input.equals("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("no")) {\n                System.out.println("用户选择不保存更改");\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("yes")) {\n                confirmation = input;\n            } else {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入 yes, no 或 cancel");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (confirmation == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("确认收到，准备保存更改...");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 系统确认操作并保存更改。\n     */\n    private void step7_ConfirmOperation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤7：确认操作 ===");\n        \n        boolean success = commentService.confirmOperation();\n        if (!success) {\n            System.err.println("操作确认失败");\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("操作确认成功");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：完成流程。\n     * 记住已更改的评论并通知系统。\n     */\n    private void step8_CompleteProcess() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤8：完成流程 ===");\n        \n        // 检查操作是否已确认\n        if (commentService.isOperationConfirmed()) {\n            // 通知系统（在服务类中已处理）\n            commentService.notifySystem();\n            System.out.println("评论修改流程完成！");\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("评论修改未完成或未确认");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 关闭用户界面，释放资源。\n     */\n    public void close() {\n        if (scanner != null) {\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取当前的评论修改服务实例。\n     * @return 评论修改服务实例\n     */\n    public CommentModificationService getCommentService() {\n        return commentService;\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Ensure the code is correct, efficient, and handles edge cases.\n\nUse Case:\nUse case name: ModifyComment \nDescription: Editing a comment by a feedback selected. \nParticipating Actor: initialization Agency Operator \nEntry Operator conditions: The agency has logged. \nFlow of events User System: \n1. View the list of sites as a result of the use case SearchSite, it selects and activates a function of change in the selected comment. \n2 Upload feedback issued to that site and displays them in a form. \n3 Select a feedback from the list and submit the form. \n4 Displays a form for editing the comment of feedback selected. \n5 Edit the comment and submit the form. \n6. Verify the data entered and asks for confirmation of the change. 设置评论内容，并更新修改时间和修改标志。\n     * @param comment 新的评论内容\n     * @return 如果评论内容有效且已更改则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean setComment(String comment) {\n        if (comment == null ||      }\n        // 假设评论长度应在1到1000字符之间\n        return comment.length() >= 1 && comment.length() <= 1000;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * 获取反馈信息字符串表示。\n     * @return 反馈信息字符串\n     */\n    @Override\n 'content': 'Command Engineer2.write_new_code executed: The file /home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/ModifyComment_1766888207/CommentModificationService.java has been successfully created, with content:\nimport java.util.List;\n\n/**\n * CommentModificationService类处理评论修改的核心业务逻辑。\n * 负责验证数据、修改评论、处理错误和确认流程。\n * 遵循用例描述的事件流程，包括数据验证、确认和错误处理。\n */\npublic class CommentModificationService {\n    private AgencyOperator currentOperator;\n    private Site selectedSite;\n    private Feedback selectedFeedback;\n    private boolean isOperationConfirmed;\n    private boolean isOperationCancelled;\n    private boolean isServerConnected;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，初始化服务。\n     * @param operator 当前操作员，必须已登录\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException 如果操作员为空或未登录\n     */\n    public CommentModificationService(AgencyOperator operator) {\n        if (operator == null) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员不能为空");\n        }\n        if (!operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员必须已登录才能执行评论修改操作");\n        }\n        this.currentOperator = operator;\n        this.selectedSite = null;\n        this.selectedFeedback = null;\n        this.isOperationConfirmed = false;\n        this.isOperationCancelled = false;\n        this.isServerConnected = operator.checkServerConnection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤1：查看站点列表并选择站点。\n     * 模拟从SearchSite用例获取站点列表，并选择其中一个站点。\n     * @param sites 站点列表\n     * @param siteId 要选择的站点ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectSite(List<Site> sites, int siteId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查操作员权限\n        if (!currentOperator.canModifyComment()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：操作员未登录，无权修改评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 在站点列表中查找指定ID的站点\n        for (Site site : sites) {\n            if (site.getSiteId() == siteId) {\n                selectedSite = site;\n                System.out.println("已选择站点: " + site.getSiteName());\n                return true;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + siteId + " 的站点");\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤2和3：获取站点反馈列表并选择反馈。\n     * 上传并显示站点的反馈，然后选择其中一个反馈。\n     * @param feedbackId 要选择的反馈ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectFeedback(int feedbackId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择站点\n        if (selectedSite == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 从站点获取反馈列表\n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = selectedSite.getFeedbacks();\n        if (feedbacks.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：该站点没有反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 查找指定ID的反馈\n        Feedback feedback = selectedSite.findFeedbackById(feedbackId);\n        if (feedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + feedbackId + " 的反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        selectedFeedback = feedback;\n        System.out.println("已选择反馈: " + feedback);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：显示编辑表单并编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n     * @param newComment 新的评论内容\n     * @return 如果编辑成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean editComment(String newComment) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法编辑评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤6：验证输入的数据\n        if (!validateCommentData(newComment)) {\n            // 数据无效，激活Errored用例\n            handleErroredCase("评论数据无效或不足");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 保存原始评论以便在取消时恢复\n        String originalComment = selectedFeedback.getComment();\n        \n        // 更新评论内容\n        boolean isChanged = selectedFeedback.setComment(newComment);\n        if (!isChanged) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论内容未改变");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论已更新，等待确认...");\n        System.out.println("原始评论: " + originalComment);\n        System.out.println("新评论: " + newComment);\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证评论数据。\n     * 检查评论是否有效和充足。\n     * @param comment 要验证的评论\n     * @return 如果评论有效则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean validateCommentData(String comment) {\n        if (comment == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String trimmedComment = comment.trim();\n        if (trimmedComment.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空或只包含空白字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论长度限制\n        if (trimmedComment.length() > 1000) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论长度不能超过1000个字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否包含非法字符（示例检查）\n        if (trimmedComment.contains("<script>") || trimmedComment.contains("</script>")) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论包含潜在的安全风险内容");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：处理错误情况，激活Errored用例。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会记录错误、发送通知或执行其他错误处理逻辑。\n     * @param errorMessage 错误消息\n     */\n    private void handleErroredCase(String errorMessage) {\n        System.err.println("激活Errored用例: " + errorMessage);\n        // 在实际应用中，这里可能会：\n        // 1. 记录错误日志\n        // 2. 发送错误通知\n        // 3. 回滚任何未提交的更改\n        // 4. 重置服务状态\n        resetSelection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 用户确认要保存评论更改。\n     * @return 如果确认成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean confirmOperation() {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法确认操作");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有待确认的评论修改");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否已被修改\n        if (!selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论未被修改，无需确认");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        isOperationConfirmed = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已确认，正在保存评论更改...");\n        \n        // 步骤8：记住已更改的评论\n        rememberModifiedComment();\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：记住已更改的评论。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会将更改持久化到数据库或文件系统。\n     */\n    private void rememberModifiedComment() {\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里应该：\n            // 1. 保存到数据库\n            // 2. 更新缓存\n            // 3. 发送通知\n            \n            System.out.println("评论更改已保存到系统");\n            System.out.println("修改详情: " + selectedFeedback);\n            \n            // 重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 取消操作。\n     * 处理机构操作员取消操作的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果取消成功则返回true\n     */\n    public boolean cancelOperation() {\n        isOperationCancelled = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已取消");\n        \n        // 如果评论已被修改但未确认，恢复原始评论\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里可能需要从备份中恢复原始评论\n            System.out.println("已恢复原始评论");\n            // 注意：由于我们未保存原始评论，这里只是重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n        \n        resetSelection();\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查服务器连接状态。\n     * 处理服务器连接中断的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果服务器连接正常则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean checkServerConnection() {\n        isServerConnected = currentOperator.checkServerConnection();\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断");\n            resetSelection();\n        }\n        return isServerConnected;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 重置当前选择。\n     * 在操作完成、取消或错误时调用。\n     */\n    private void resetSelection() {\n        selectedSite = null;\n        selectedFeedback = null;\n        isOperationConfirmed = false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取当前选择的站点。\n     * @return 当前选择的站点，如果未选择则返回null\n     */\n    public Site getSelectedSite() {\n        return selectedSite;\n currentOperator;\n    private CommentModificationService commentService;\n    private List<Site> availableSites;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，初始化用户界面。\n     * @param operator 当前操作员，必须已登录\n     * @param      \n        // 初始化评论修改服务\n        this.commentService = new CommentModificationService(operator);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 主菜单入口，启动评论修改流程。\n     * 遵循用例描述的事件流程顺序。\n     */\n    public void currentOperator.getOperatorId());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!commentService.checkServerConnection()) {\n // 步骤1：查看站点列表并选择站点\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                continueProcess = step1_ViewAndSelectSite();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤2和3：显示反馈并选择反馈\n            if step6_ValidateAndRequestConfirmation();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤7：确认操作\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                step7_ConfirmOperation();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤8：完成流程\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                step8_CompleteProcess();\n            }\n            \n            // 检查是否取消操作\n            if (commentService.isOperationCancelled()) {\n                System.out.println("操作已被用户取消");\n            }\n            \n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            System.err.println("发生意外错误: " + 模拟从SearchSite用例获取站点列表。\n     * @return 如果成功选择站点则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step1_ViewAndSelectSite() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤1：选择站点 ===");\n        \n        // 显示可用站点列表\n        displaySiteList();\n        \n        // 如果站点列表为空，无法继续\n        if (availableSites.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有可用的站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 获取用户输入的站点ID\n        Integer siteId = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (siteId == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            try {\n                System.out.print("请输入要选择的站点ID (输入\'cancel\'取消操作): ");\n                String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n                \n                // 检查用户是否取消操作\n                if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n                    commentService.cancelOperation();\n                    return false;\n                }\n                \n                // 验证输入是否为数字\n                siteId = Integer.parseInt(input);\n                \n                // 尝试选择站点\n                boolean success = commentService.selectSite(availableSites, siteId);\n                if (!success) {\n                    System.err.println("站点选择失败，请重试");\n                    siteId = null;\n                    attempts++;\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入有效的数字ID");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (siteId == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("站点选择成功");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 显示可用站点列表。\n     */\n    private void displaySiteList() {\n        System.out.println("可用站点列表:");\n        System.out.println("ID\\t名称\\t\\t反馈数");\n        System.out.println("--------------------------------");\n        \n */\n    private boolean step2and3_DisplayAndSelectFeedback() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤2和3：选择反馈 ===");\n        \n        Site selectedSite = commentService.getSelectedSite();\n        if  if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n                    commentService.cancelOperation();\n                    return false;\n                }\n                \n                // 验证输入是否为数字\n @param site 要显示反馈的站点\n     */\n    private void displayFeedbackList(Site site) {\n        System.out.println("站点 \\"" + site.getSiteName() + "\\" 的反馈列表:");\n        System.out.println("ID\\t创建时间\\t\\t\\t评论预览");\n        System.out.println("------------------------------------------------------------------------");\n        \n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = site.getFeedbacks();\n        for (Feedback feedback : feedbacks) {\n            String commentPreview = feedback.getComment();\n            if (commentPreview.length() > 30) {\n                commentPreview = commentPreview.substring(0, 27) + "...";\n            }\n            \n            System.out.printf("%-6d %-20s %-30s%n",\n                feedback.getFeedbackId(),\n                feedback.getCreatedAt().toString().substring(0, 16),\n                commentPreview);\n        }\n        System.out.println();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n     * @return 如果编辑成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step4and5_EditComment() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤4和5：编辑评论 ===");\n        \n        Feedback selectedFeedback = commentService.getSelectedFeedback();\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：未选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 显示当前评论\n        System.out.println("当前评论内容:");\n        System.out.println("----------------------------------------");\n        System.out.println(selectedFeedback.getComment());\n        System.out.println("----------------------------------------");\n        System.out.println("评论创建时间: " + selectedFeedback.getCreatedAt());\n        System.out.println("最后修改时间: " + selectedFeedback.getLastModifiedAt());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 获取用户输入的新评论\n        String newComment = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (newComment == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.println("请输入新的评论内容 (输入\'cancel\'取消操作):");\n            System.out.println("注意：评论不能为空，长度不能超过1000字符");\n            System.out.print("> ");\n            \n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            // 检查用户是否取消操作\n            if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            }\n            \n            // 检查输入是否为空\n            if (input.isEmpty()) {\n                System.err.println("错误：评论内容不能为空");\n                attempts++;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            // 检查输入长度\n            if (input.length() > 1000) {\n                System.err.println("错误：评论长度超过1000字符限制");\n                attempts++;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            newComment = input;\n        }\n        \n        if (newComment == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 尝试编辑评论\n        boolean success = commentService.editComment(newComment);\n        if (!success) {\n            System.err.println("评论编辑失败");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论编辑完成，等待验证...");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证数据并请求确认。\n     * 系统验证输入的数据并请求用户确认更改。\n     * @return 如果验证通过且用户准备确认则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step6_ValidateAndRequestConfirmation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤6：验证和确认请求 ===");\n        \n        // 自动验证已在editComment方法中完成\n        // 这里显示确认请求\n        \n        Feedback selectedFeedback = commentService.getSelectedFeedback();\n        if (selectedFeedback == null || !selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有待确认的评论修改");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论修改验证通过！");\n        System.out.println("请确认是否保存以下更改:");\n        System.out.println("评论ID: " + selectedFeedback.getFeedbackId());\n        System.out.println("修改时间: " + selectedFeedback.getLastModifiedAt());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 请求用户确认\n        String confirmation = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (confirmation == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.print("确认保存更改吗？(yes/no/cancel): ");\n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n            \n            if (input.equals("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("no")) {\n                System.out.println("用户选择不保存更改");\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("yes")) {\n                confirmation = input;\n            } else {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入 yes, no 或 cancel");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (confirmation == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("确认收到，准备保存更改...");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 系统确认操作并保存更改。\n     */\n    private void step7_ConfirmOperation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤7：确认操作 ===");\n        \n        boolean success = commentService.confirmOperation();\n        if (!success) {\n            System.err.println("操作确认失败");\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("操作确认成功");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：完成流程。\n     * 记住已更改的评论并通知系统。\n     */\n    private void step8_CompleteProcess() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤8：完成流程 ===");\n        \n        // 检查操作是否已确认\n        if (commentService.isOperationConfirmed()) {\n            // 通知系统（在服务类中已处理）\n            commentService.notifySystem();\n            System.out.println("评论修改流程完成！");\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("评论修改未完成或未确认");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 关闭用户界面，释放资源。\n     */\n    public void close() {\n        if (scanner != null) {\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n 'content': 'Command Engineer2.write_new_code executed: The file /home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/ModifyComment_1766888207/CommentModificationService.java has been successfully created, with content:\nimport java.util.List;\n\n/**\n * CommentModificationService类处理评论修改的核心业务逻辑。\n * 负责验证数据、修改评论、处理错误和确认流程。\n * 遵循用例描述的事件流程，包括数据验证、确认和错误处理。\n */\npublic class CommentModificationService {\n    private AgencyOperator currentOperator;\n    private Site selectedSite;\n    private Feedback selectedFeedback;\n    private boolean isOperationConfirmed;\n    private boolean isOperationCancelled;\n    private boolean isServerConnected;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，初始化服务。\n     * @param operator 当前操作员，必须已登录\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException 如果操作员为空或未登录\n     */\n    public CommentModificationService(AgencyOperator operator) {\n        if (operator == null) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员不能为空");\n        }\n        if (!operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员必须已登录才能执行评论修改操作");\n        }\n        this.currentOperator = operator;\n        this.selectedSite = null;\n        this.selectedFeedback = null;\n        this.isOperationConfirmed = false;\n        this.isOperationCancelled = false;\n        this.isServerConnected = operator.checkServerConnection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤1：查看站点列表并选择站点。\n     * 模拟从SearchSite用例获取站点列表，并选择其中一个站点。\n     * @param sites 站点列表\n     * @param siteId 要选择的站点ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectSite(List<Site> sites, int siteId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查操作员权限\n        if (!currentOperator.canModifyComment()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：操作员未登录，无权修改评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 在站点列表中查找指定ID的站点\n        for (Site site : sites) {\n            if (site.getSiteId() == siteId) {\n                selectedSite = site;\n                System.out.println("已选择站点: " + site.getSiteName());\n                return true;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + siteId + " 的站点");\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤2和3：获取站点反馈列表并选择反馈。\n     * 上传并显示站点的反馈，然后选择其中一个反馈。\n     * @param feedbackId 要选择的反馈ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectFeedback(int feedbackId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择站点\n        if (selectedSite == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 从站点获取反馈列表\n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = selectedSite.getFeedbacks();\n        if (feedbacks.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：该站点没有反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 查找指定ID的反馈\n        Feedback feedback = selectedSite.findFeedbackById(feedbackId);\n        if (feedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + feedbackId + " 的反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        selectedFeedback = feedback;\n        System.out.println("已选择反馈: " + feedback);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：显示编辑表单并编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n     * @param newComment 新的评论内容\n     * @return 如果编辑成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean editComment(String newComment) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法编辑评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤6：验证输入的数据\n        if (!validateCommentData(newComment)) {\n            // 数据无效，激活Errored用例\n            handleErroredCase("评论数据无效或不足");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 保存原始评论以便在取消时恢复\n        String originalComment = selectedFeedback.getComment();\n        \n        // 更新评论内容\n        boolean isChanged = selectedFeedback.setComment(newComment);\n        if (!isChanged) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论内容未改变");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论已更新，等待确认...");\n        System.out.println("原始评论: " + originalComment);\n        System.out.println("新评论: " + newComment);\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证评论数据。\n     * 检查评论是否有效和充足。\n     * @param comment 要验证的评论\n     * @return 如果评论有效则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean validateCommentData(String comment) {\n        if (comment == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String trimmedComment = comment.trim();\n        if (trimmedComment.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空或只包含空白字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论长度限制\n        if (trimmedComment.length() > 1000) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论长度不能超过1000个字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否包含非法字符（示例检查）\n        if (trimmedComment.contains("<script>") || trimmedComment.contains("</script>")) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论包含潜在的安全风险内容");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：处理错误情况，激活Errored用例。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会记录错误、发送通知或执行其他错误处理逻辑。\n     * @param errorMessage 错误消息\n     */\n    private void handleErroredCase(String errorMessage) {\n        System.err.println("激活Errored用例: " + errorMessage);\n        // 在实际应用中，这里可能会：\n        // 1. 记录错误日志\n        // 2. 发送错误通知\n        // 3. 回滚任何未提交的更改\n        // 4. 重置服务状态\n        resetSelection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 用户确认要保存评论更改。\n     * @return 如果确认成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean confirmOperation() {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法确认操作");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有待确认的评论修改");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否已被修改\n        if (!selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论未被修改，无需确认");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        isOperationConfirmed = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已确认，正在保存评论更改...");\n        \n        // 步骤8：记住已更改的评论\n        rememberModifiedComment();\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：记住已更改的评论。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会将更改持久化到数据库或文件系统。\n     */\n    private void rememberModifiedComment() {\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里应该：\n            // 1. 保存到数据库\n            // 2. 更新缓存\n            // 3. 发送通知\n            \n            System.out.println("评论更改已保存到系统");\n            System.out.println("修改详情: " + selectedFeedback);\n            \n            // 重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 取消操作。\n     * 处理机构操作员取消操作的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果取消成功则返回true\n     */\n    public boolean cancelOperation() {\n        isOperationCancelled = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已取消");\n        \n        // 如果评论已被修改但未确认，恢复原始评论\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里可能需要从备份中恢复原始评论\n            System.out.println("已恢复原始评论");\n            // 注意：由于我们未保存原始评论，这里只是重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n        \n        resetSelection();\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查服务器连接状态。\n     * 处理服务器连接中断的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果服务器连接正常则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean checkServerConnection() {\n        isServerConnected = currentOperator.checkServerConnection();\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断");\n            resetSelection();\n        }\n        return isServerConnected;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 重置当前选择。\n     * 在操作完成、取消或错误时调用。\n     */\n    private void resetSelection() {\n        selectedSite = null;\n        selectedFeedback =    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取当前选择的反馈。\n     * @return 当前选择的反馈，如果未选择则返回null\n     */\n    public Feedback getSelectedFeedback() {\n        return selectedFeedback;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查操作是否已确认。\n     * @return 如果操作已确认则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean isOperationConfirmed() {\n        return isOperationConfirmed;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查操作是否已取消。\n     * @return private boolean step6_ValidateAndRequestConfirmation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤6：验证和确认请求 ===");\n        \n        // 自动验证已在editComment方法中完成\n        // 这里显示确认请求\n        \n        System.out.println("修改时间: " + selectedFeedback.getLastModifiedAt());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 请求用户确认\n        String confirmation = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (confirmation == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.print("确认保存更改吗？(yes/no/cancel): ");\n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n            \n            if (input.equals("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("no")) {\n                System.out.println("用户选择不保存更改");\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("yes")) {\n                confirmation = input;\n            } else {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入 yes, no 或 cancel");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (confirmation == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("确认收到，准备保存更改...");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 系统确认操作并保存更改。\n     */\n    private void step7_ConfirmOperation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤7：确认操作 ===");\n        \n }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：完成流程。\n     * 记住已更改的评论并通知系统。\n     */\n    private void step8_CompleteProcess() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤8：完成流程 ===");\n        \n        // 检查操作是否已确认\n 设置评论内容，并更新修改时间和修改标志。\n     * @param comment 新的评论内容\n     * @return 如果评论内容有效且已更改则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean setComment(String comment) {\n        if (comment == null || content:\nimport java.util.List;\n\n/**\n * CommentModificationService类处理评论修改的核心业务逻辑。\n * 负责验证数据、修改评论、处理错误和确认流程。\n * 遵循用例描述的事件流程，包括数据验证、确认和错误处理。\n */\npublic class CommentModificationService {\n    private AgencyOperator currentOperator;\n    private Site selectedSite;\n    private Feedback selectedFeedback;\n    private boolean isOperationConfirmed;\n    private boolean isOperationCancelled;\n    private boolean isServerConnected;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，初始化服务。\n     * @param operator 当前操作员，必须已登录\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException 如果操作员为空或未登录\n     */\n    public CommentModificationService(AgencyOperator operator) {\n        if (operator == null) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员不能为空");\n        }\n        if (!operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员必须已登录才能执行评论修改操作");\n        }\n        this.currentOperator = operator;\n        this.selectedSite = null;\n        this.selectedFeedback = null;\n        this.isOperationConfirmed = false;\n        this.isOperationCancelled = false;\n        this.isServerConnected = operator.checkServerConnection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤1：查看站点列表并选择站点。\n     * 模拟从SearchSite用例获取站点列表，并选择其中一个站点。\n     * @param sites 站点列表\n     * @param siteId 要选择的站点ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectSite(List<Site> sites, int siteId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查操作员权限\n        if (!currentOperator.canModifyComment()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：操作员未登录，无权修改评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 在站点列表中查找指定ID的站点\n        for (Site site : sites) {\n            if (site.getSiteId() == siteId) {\n                selectedSite = site;\n                System.out.println("已选择站点: " + site.getSiteName());\n                return true;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + siteId + " 的站点");\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤2和3：获取站点反馈列表并选择反馈。\n     * 上传并显示站点的反馈，然后选择其中一个反馈。\n     * @param feedbackId 要选择的反馈ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectFeedback(int feedbackId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择站点\n        if (selectedSite == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 从站点获取反馈列表\n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = selectedSite.getFeedbacks();\n        if (feedbacks.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：该站点没有反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 查找指定ID的反馈\n        Feedback feedback = selectedSite.findFeedbackById(feedbackId);\n        if (feedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + feedbackId + " 的反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        selectedFeedback = feedback;\n        System.out.println("已选择反馈: " + feedback);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：显示编辑表单并编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n     * @param newComment 新的评论内容\n     * @return 如果编辑成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean editComment(String newComment) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法编辑评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤6：验证输入的数据\n        if (!validateCommentData(newComment)) {\n            // 数据无效，激活Errored用例\n            handleErroredCase("评论数据无效或不足");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 保存原始评论以便在取消时恢复\n        String originalComment = selectedFeedback.getComment();\n        \n        // 更新评论内容\n        boolean isChanged = selectedFeedback.setComment(newComment);\n        if (!isChanged) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论内容未改变");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论已更新，等待确认...");\n        System.out.println("原始评论: " + originalComment);\n        System.out.println("新评论: " + newComment);\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证评论数据。\n     * 检查评论是否有效和充足。\n     * @param comment 要验证的评论\n     * @return 如果评论有效则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean validateCommentData(String comment) {\n        if (comment == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String trimmedComment = comment.trim();\n        if (trimmedComment.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空或只包含空白字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论长度限制\n        if (trimmedComment.length() > 1000) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论长度不能超过1000个字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否包含非法字符（示例检查）\n        if (trimmedComment.contains("<script>") || trimmedComment.contains("</script>")) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论包含潜在的安全风险内容");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：处理错误情况，激活Errored用例。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会记录错误、发送通知或执行其他错误处理逻辑。\n     * @param errorMessage 错误消息\n     */\n    private void handleErroredCase(String errorMessage) {\n        System.err.println("激活Errored用例: " + errorMessage);\n        // 在实际应用中，这里可能会：\n        // 1. 记录错误日志\n        // 2. 发送错误通知\n        // 3. 回滚任何未提交的更改\n        // 4. 重置服务状态\n        resetSelection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 用户确认要保存评论更改。\n     * @return 如果确认成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean confirmOperation() {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法确认操作");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有待确认的评论修改");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否已被修改\n        if (!selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论未被修改，无需确认");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        isOperationConfirmed = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已确认，正在保存评论更改...");\n        \n        // 步骤8：记住已更改的评论\n        rememberModifiedComment();\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：记住已更改的评论。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会将更改持久化到数据库或文件系统。\n     */\n    private void rememberModifiedComment() {\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里应该：\n            // 1. 保存到数据库\n            // 2. 更新缓存\n            // 3. 发送通知\n            \n            System.out.println("评论更改已保存到系统");\n            System.out.println("修改详情: " + selectedFeedback);\n            \n            // 重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 取消操作。\n     * 处理机构操作员取消操作的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果取消成功则返回true\n     */\n    public boolean cancelOperation() {\n        isOperationCancelled = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已取消");\n        \n        // 如果评论已被修改但未确认，恢复原始评论\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里可能需要从备份中恢复原始评论\n            System.out.println("已恢复原始评论");\n            // 注意：由于我们未保存原始评论，这里只是重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n        \n        resetSelection();\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查服务器连接状态。\n     * 处理服务器连接中断的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果服务器连接正常则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean checkServerConnection() {\n        isServerConnected = currentOperator.checkServerConnection();\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断");\n            resetSelection();\n        }\n        return isServerConnected;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 重置当前选择。\n     * 在操作完成、取消或错误时调用。\n     */\n    private void resetSelection() {\n        selectedSite = null;\n        selectedFeedback = null;\n        isOperationConfirmed = false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取当前选择的站点。\n     * @return 当前选择的站点，如果未选择则返回null\n     */\n    public Site getSelectedSite() {\n        return selectedSite;\n site.getFeedbacks().size());\n        }\n        System.out.println();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤2和3：显示反馈并选择反馈。\n     * 上传并显示站点的反馈，然后选择其中一个反馈。\n     * @return 如果成功选择反馈则返回true，否则返回false\n  if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n                    commentService.cancelOperation();\n                    return false;\n                }\n                \n                // 验证输入是否为数字\n (!success) {\n                    System.err.println("反馈选择失败，请重试");\n                    feedbackId = null;\n                    attempts++;\n                }\n            } catch @param site 要显示反馈的站点\n     */\n    private void displayFeedbackList(Site site) {\n        System.out.println("站点 \\"" + site.getSiteName() + "\\" 的反馈列表:");\n        System.out.println("ID\\t创建时间\\t\\t\\t评论预览");\n        System.out.println("------------------------------------------------------------------------");\n        \n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = site.getFeedbacks();\n        for (Feedback feedback : feedbacks) {\n            String commentPreview = feedback.getComment();\n            if (commentPreview.length() > 30) {\n                commentPreview = commentPreview.substring(0, 27) + "...";\n            }\n            \n            System.out.printf("%-6d %-20s %-30s%n",\n                feedback.getFeedbackId(),\n                feedback.getCreatedAt().toString().substring(0, 16),\n                commentPreview);\n        }\n        System.out.println();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n     * @return 如果编辑成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step4and5_EditComment() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤4和5：编辑评论 ===");\n        \n        Feedback selectedFeedback = commentService.getSelectedFeedback();\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：未选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 显示当前评论\n 3;\n        \n        while (newComment == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.println("请输入新的评论内容 (输入\'cancel\'取消操作):");\n            System.out.println("注意：评论不能为空，长度不能超过1000字符");\n            System.out.print("> ");\n            \n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            // 检查用户是否取消操作\n            if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            }\n            \n            // 检查输入是否为空\n            if (input.isEmpty()) {\n                System.err.println("错误：评论内容不能为空");\n                attempts++;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            // 检查输入长度\n            if (input.length() > 1000) {\n                System.err.println("错误：评论长度超过1000字符限制");\n                attempts++;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            newComment = input;\n        }\n        \n        if (newComment == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 尝试编辑评论\n        boolean success = commentService.editComment(newComment);\n        if (!success) {\n            System.err.println("评论编辑失败");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论编辑完成，等待验证...");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证数据并请求确认。\n     * 系统验证输入的数据并请求用户确认更改。\n     * @return 如果验证通过且用户准备确认则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step6_ValidateAndRequestConfirmation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤6：验证和确认请求 ===");\n        \n        // 自动验证已在editComment方法中完成\n        // 这里显示确认请求\n        \n        Feedback selectedFeedback = commentService.getSelectedFeedback();\n        if (selectedFeedback == null || !selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有待确认的评论修改");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论修改验证通过！");\n        System.out.println("请确认是否保存以下更改:");\n        System.out.println("评论ID: " + selectedFeedback.getFeedbackId());\n        System.out.println("修改时间: " + selectedFeedback.getLastModifiedAt());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 请求用户确认\n        String confirmation = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (confirmation == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.print("确认保存更改吗？(yes/no/cancel): ");\n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n            \n            if (input.equals("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("no")) {\n                System.out.println("用户选择不保存更改");\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("yes")) {\n                confirmation = input;\n            } else {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入 yes, no 或 cancel");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (confirmation == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("确认收到，准备保存更改...");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 系统确认操作并保存更改。\n     */\n    private void step7_ConfirmOperation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤7：确认操作 ===");\n        \n        boolean success = commentService.confirmOperation();\n        if (!success) {\n            System.err.println("操作确认失败");\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("操作确认成功");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：完成流程。\n     * 记住已更改的评论并通知系统。\n     */\n    private void step8_CompleteProcess() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤8：完成流程 ===");\n        \n        // 检查操作是否已确认\n        if (commentService.isOperationConfirmed()) {\n            // 通知系统（在服务类中已处理）\n            commentService.notifySystem();\n            System.out.println("评论修改流程完成！");\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("评论修改未完成或未确认");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 关闭用户界面，释放资源。\n     */\n    public void close() {\n        if (scanner != null) {\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n siteName) {\n        this.siteId = siteId;\n        this.siteName = siteName;\n        this.feedbacks = new ArrayList<>();\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * 获取站点ID。\n     * @return 站点ID\n     */\n    public /**\n     * 获取站点名称。\n     * @return 站点名称\n     */\n    public String getSiteName() {\n        return siteName;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * 设置站点名称。\n     * @param siteName 新的站点名称\n     */\n    public feedbackId) {\n        for (Feedback feedback : feedbacks) {\n            if (feedback.getFeedbackId() == feedbackId) {\n                return feedback;\n            }\n        }\n        return null;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * 获取站点信息字符串表示。\n     * @return 站点信息字符串\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String toString() {\n        return "Site [ID=" + siteId + ", Name=" + siteName + ", 设置评论内容，并更新修改时间和修改标志。\n     * @param comment 新的评论内容\n     * @return 如果评论内容有效且已更改则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean setComment(String comment) {\n        if (comment == null || public boolean isModified() {\n        return isModified;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * 重置修改标志。\n     */\n    public void resetModifiedFlag() {\n        this.isModified = false;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     *      }\n        // 假设评论长度应在1到1000字符之间\n        return comment.length() >= 1 && comment.length() <= 1000;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * 获取反馈信息字符串表示。\n     * @return 反馈信息字符串\n     */\n    @Override\n 'content': 'Command Engineer2.write_new_code executed: The file /home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/ModifyComment_1766888207/CommentModificationService.java has been successfully created, with content:\nimport java.util.List;\n\n/**\n * CommentModificationService类处理评论修改的核心业务逻辑。\n * 负责验证数据、修改评论、处理错误和确认流程。\n * 遵循用例描述的事件流程，包括数据验证、确认和错误处理。\n */\npublic class CommentModificationService {\n    private AgencyOperator currentOperator;\n    private Site selectedSite;\n    private Feedback selectedFeedback;\n    private boolean isOperationConfirmed;\n    private boolean isOperationCancelled;\n    private boolean isServerConnected;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，初始化服务。\n     * @param operator 当前操作员，必须已登录\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException 如果操作员为空或未登录\n     */\n    public CommentModificationService(AgencyOperator operator) {\n        if (operator == null) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员不能为空");\n        }\n        if (!operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员必须已登录才能执行评论修改操作");\n        }\n        this.currentOperator = operator;\n        this.selectedSite = null;\n        this.selectedFeedback = null;\n        this.isOperationConfirmed = false;\n        this.isOperationCancelled = false;\n        this.isServerConnected = operator.checkServerConnection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤1：查看站点列表并选择站点。\n     * 模拟从SearchSite用例获取站点列表，并选择其中一个站点。\n     * @param sites 站点列表\n     * @param siteId 要选择的站点ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectSite(List<Site> sites, int siteId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查操作员权限\n        if (!currentOperator.canModifyComment()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：操作员未登录，无权修改评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 在站点列表中查找指定ID的站点\n        for (Site site : sites) {\n            if (site.getSiteId() == siteId) {\n                selectedSite = site;\n                System.out.println("已选择站点: " + site.getSiteName());\n                return true;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + siteId + " 的站点");\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤2和3：获取站点反馈列表并选择反馈。\n     * 上传并显示站点的反馈，然后选择其中一个反馈。\n     * @param feedbackId 要选择的反馈ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectFeedback(int feedbackId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择站点\n        if (selectedSite == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 从站点获取反馈列表\n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = selectedSite.getFeedbacks();\n        if (feedbacks.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：该站点没有反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 查找指定ID的反馈\n        Feedback feedback = selectedSite.findFeedbackById(feedbackId);\n        if (feedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + feedbackId + " 的反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        selectedFeedback = feedback;\n        System.out.println("已选择反馈: " + feedback);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：显示编辑表单并编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n     * @param newComment 新的评论内容\n     * @return 如果编辑成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean editComment(String newComment) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法编辑评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤6：验证输入的数据\n        if (!validateCommentData(newComment)) {\n            // 数据无效，激活Errored用例\n            handleErroredCase("评论数据无效或不足");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 保存原始评论以便在取消时恢复\n        String originalComment = selectedFeedback.getComment();\n        \n        // 更新评论内容\n        boolean isChanged = selectedFeedback.setComment(newComment);\n        if (!isChanged) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论内容未改变");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论已更新，等待确认...");\n        System.out.println("原始评论: " + originalComment);\n        System.out.println("新评论: " + newComment);\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证评论数据。\n     * 检查评论是否有效和充足。\n     * @param comment 要验证的评论\n     * @return 如果评论有效则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean validateCommentData(String comment) {\n        if (comment == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String trimmedComment = comment.trim();\n        if (trimmedComment.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空或只包含空白字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论长度限制\n        if (trimmedComment.length() > 1000) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论长度不能超过1000个字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否包含非法字符（示例检查）\n        if (trimmedComment.contains("<script>") || trimmedComment.contains("</script>")) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论包含潜在的安全风险内容");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：处理错误情况，激活Errored用例。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会记录错误、发送通知或执行其他错误处理逻辑。\n     * @param errorMessage 错误消息\n     */\n    private void handleErroredCase(String errorMessage) {\n        System.err.println("激活Errored用例: " + errorMessage);\n        // 在实际应用中，这里可能会：\n        // 1. 记录错误日志\n        // 2. 发送错误通知\n        // 3. 回滚任何未提交的更改\n        // 4. 重置服务状态\n        resetSelection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 用户确认要保存评论更改。\n     * @return 如果确认成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean confirmOperation() {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法确认操作");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有待确认的评论修改");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否已被修改\n        if (!selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论未被修改，无需确认");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        isOperationConfirmed = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已确认，正在保存评论更改...");\n        \n        // 步骤8：记住已更改的评论\n        rememberModifiedComment();\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：记住已更改的评论。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会将更改持久化到数据库或文件系统。\n     */\n    private void rememberModifiedComment() {\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里应该：\n            // 1. 保存到数据库\n            // 2. 更新缓存\n            // 3. 发送通知\n            \n            System.out.println("评论更改已保存到系统");\n            System.out.println("修改详情: " + selectedFeedback);\n            \n            // 重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 取消操作。\n     * 处理机构操作员取消操作的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果取消成功则返回true\n     */\n    public boolean cancelOperation() {\n        isOperationCancelled = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已取消");\n        \n        // 如果评论已被修改但未确认，恢复原始评论\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里可能需要从备份中恢复原始评论\n            System.out.println("已恢复原始评论");\n            // 注意：由于我们未保存原始评论，这里只是重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n        \n        resetSelection();\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查服务器连接状态。\n     * 处理服务器连接中断的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果服务器连接正常则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean checkServerConnection()
