System.out.println("ID\\t创建时间\\t\\t\\t评论预览");\n        System.out.println("------------------------------------------------------------------------");\n        \n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = site.getFeedbacks();\n        for (Feedback feedback : feedbacks) {\n            String commentPreview = feedback.getComment();\n            if (commentPreview.length() > 30) {\n                commentPreview = commentPreview.substring(0, 27) + "...";\n            }\n            \n            System.out.printf("%-6d %-20s %-30s%n",\n                feedback.getFeedbackId(),\n                feedback.getCreatedAt().toString().substring(0, 16),\n                commentPreview);\n        }\n        System.out.println();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n private boolean step6_ValidateAndRequestConfirmation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤6：验证和确认请求 ===");\n        \n        // 自动验证已在editComment方法中完成\n        // 这里显示确认请求\n        \n        Feedback selectedFeedback = commentService.getSelectedFeedback();\n        if (selectedFeedback == null || !selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有待确认的评论修改");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论修改验证通过！");\n        System.out.println("请确认是否保存以下更改:");\n        System.out.println("评论ID: " + selectedFeedback.getFeedbackId());\n        System.out.println("修改时间: " + selectedFeedback.getLastModifiedAt());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 请求用户确认\n        String confirmation = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (confirmation == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.print("确认保存更改吗？(yes/no/cancel): ");\n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n            \n            if (input.equals("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("no")) {\n                System.out.println("用户选择不保存更改");\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("yes")) {\n                confirmation = input;\n            } else {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入 yes, no 或 cancel");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (confirmation == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("确认收到，准备保存更改...");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 系统确认操作并保存更改。\n     */\n    private void step7_ConfirmOperation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤7：确认操作 ===");\n        \n }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：完成流程。\n     * 记住已更改的评论并通知系统。\n     */\n    private void step8_CompleteProcess() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤8：完成流程 ===");\n        \n        // 检查操作是否已确认\n 设置评论内容，并更新修改时间和修改标志。\n     * @param comment 新的评论内容\n     * @return 如果评论内容有效且已更改则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean setComment(String comment) {\n        if (comment == null || 'content': 'Command Engineer2.write_new_code executed: The file /home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/ModifyComment_1766888207/CommentModificationService.java has been successfully created, with content:\nimport java.util.List;\n\n/**\n * CommentModificationService类处理评论修改的核心业务逻辑。\n * 负责验证数据、修改评论、处理错误和确认流程。\n * 遵循用例描述的事件流程，包括数据验证、确认和错误处理。\n */\npublic class CommentModificationService {\n    private AgencyOperator currentOperator;\n    private Site selectedSite;\n    private Feedback selectedFeedback;\n    private boolean isOperationConfirmed;\n    private boolean isOperationCancelled;\n    private boolean isServerConnected;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，初始化服务。\n     * @param operator 当前操作员，必须已登录\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException 如果操作员为空或未登录\n     */\n    public CommentModificationService(AgencyOperator operator) {\n        if (operator == null) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员不能为空");\n        }\n        if (!operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员必须已登录才能执行评论修改操作");\n        }\n        this.currentOperator = operator;\n        this.selectedSite = null;\n        this.selectedFeedback = null;\n        this.isOperationConfirmed = false;\n        this.isOperationCancelled = false;\n        this.isServerConnected = operator.checkServerConnection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤1：查看站点列表并选择站点。\n     * 模拟从SearchSite用例获取站点列表，并选择其中一个站点。\n     * @param sites 站点列表\n     * @param siteId 要选择的站点ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectSite(List<Site> sites, int siteId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查操作员权限\n        if (!currentOperator.canModifyComment()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：操作员未登录，无权修改评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 在站点列表中查找指定ID的站点\n        for (Site site : sites) {\n            if (site.getSiteId() == siteId) {\n                selectedSite = site;\n                System.out.println("已选择站点: " + site.getSiteName());\n                return true;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + siteId + " 的站点");\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤2和3：获取站点反馈列表并选择反馈。\n     * 上传并显示站点的反馈，然后选择其中一个反馈。\n     * @param feedbackId 要选择的反馈ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectFeedback(int feedbackId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择站点\n        if (selectedSite == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 从站点获取反馈列表\n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = selectedSite.getFeedbacks();\n        if (feedbacks.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：该站点没有反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 查找指定ID的反馈\n        Feedback feedback = selectedSite.findFeedbackById(feedbackId);\n        if (feedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + feedbackId + " 的反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        selectedFeedback = feedback;\n        System.out.println("已选择反馈: " + feedback);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：显示编辑表单并编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n     * @param newComment 新的评论内容\n     * @return 如果编辑成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean editComment(String newComment) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法编辑评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤6：验证输入的数据\n        if (!validateCommentData(newComment)) {\n            // 数据无效，激活Errored用例\n            handleErroredCase("评论数据无效或不足");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 保存原始评论以便在取消时恢复\n        String originalComment = selectedFeedback.getComment();\n        \n        // 更新评论内容\n        boolean isChanged = selectedFeedback.setComment(newComment);\n        if (!isChanged) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论内容未改变");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论已更新，等待确认...");\n        System.out.println("原始评论: " + originalComment);\n        System.out.println("新评论: " + newComment);\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证评论数据。\n     * 检查评论是否有效和充足。\n     * @param comment 要验证的评论\n     * @return 如果评论有效则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean validateCommentData(String comment) {\n        if (comment == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String trimmedComment = comment.trim();\n        if (trimmedComment.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空或只包含空白字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论长度限制\n        if (trimmedComment.length() > 1000) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论长度不能超过1000个字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否包含非法字符（示例检查）\n        if (trimmedComment.contains("<script>") || trimmedComment.contains("</script>")) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论包含潜在的安全风险内容");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：处理错误情况，激活Errored用例。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会记录错误、发送通知或执行其他错误处理逻辑。\n     * @param errorMessage 错误消息\n     */\n    private void handleErroredCase(String errorMessage) {\n        System.err.println("激活Errored用例: " + errorMessage);\n        // 在实际应用中，这里可能会：\n        // 1. 记录错误日志\n        // 2. 发送错误通知\n        // 3. 回滚任何未提交的更改\n        // 4. 重置服务状态\n        resetSelection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 用户确认要保存评论更改。\n     * @return 如果确认成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean confirmOperation() {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法确认操作");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有待确认的评论修改");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否已被修改\n        if (!selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论未被修改，无需确认");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        isOperationConfirmed = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已确认，正在保存评论更改...");\n        \n        // 步骤8：记住已更改的评论\n        rememberModifiedComment();\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：记住已更改的评论。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会将更改持久化到数据库或文件系统。\n     */\n    private void rememberModifiedComment() {\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里应该：\n            // 1. 保存到数据库\n            // 2. 更新缓存\n            // 3. 发送通知\n            \n            System.out.println("评论更改已保存到系统");\n            System.out.println("修改详情: " + selectedFeedback);\n            \n            // 重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 取消操作。\n     * 处理机构操作员取消操作的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果取消成功则返回true\n     */\n    public boolean cancelOperation() {\n        isOperationCancelled = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已取消");\n        \n        // 如果评论已被修改但未确认，恢复原始评论\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里可能需要从备份中恢复原始评论\n            System.out.println("已恢复原始评论");\n            // 注意：由于我们未保存原始评论，这里只是重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n        \n        resetSelection();\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查服务器连接状态。\n     * 处理服务器连接中断的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果服务器连接正常则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean checkServerConnection() System.out.println("ID\\t创建时间\\t\\t\\t评论预览");\n        System.out.println("------------------------------------------------------------------------");\n        \n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = commentPreview = commentPreview.substring(0, 27) + "...";\n            }\n            \n            System.out.printf("%-6d %-20s %-30s%n",\n                feedback.getFeedbackId(),\n                feedback.getCreatedAt().toString().substring(0, 16),\n                commentPreview);\n        }\n        System.out.println();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n private boolean step6_ValidateAndRequestConfirmation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤6：验证和确认请求 ===");\n        \n        // 自动验证已在editComment方法中完成\n        // 这里显示确认请求\n        \n        System.out.println("修改时间: " + selectedFeedback.getLastModifiedAt());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 请求用户确认\n        String confirmation = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (confirmation == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.print("确认保存更改吗？(yes/no/cancel): ");\n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n            \n            if (input.equals("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("no")) {\n                System.out.println("用户选择不保存更改");\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("yes")) {\n                confirmation = input;\n            } else {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入 yes, no 或 cancel");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n       return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 系统确认操作并保存更改。\n     */\n    private void step7_ConfirmOperation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤7：确认操作 ===");\n        \n }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：完成流程。\n     * 记住已更改的评论并通知系统。\n     */\n    private void step8_CompleteProcess() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤8：完成流程 ===");\n        \n        // 检查操作是否已确认\n an existing plan to achieve the goal. A plan consists of one to 3 tasks.\nIf plan is created, you should track the progress and update the plan accordingly, such as Plan.finish_current_task, Plan.append_task, Plan.reset_task, Plan.replace_task, etc.\nWhen presented a current task, tackle the task using the available commands.\nPay close attention to new user message, review the conversation history, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to respond to new user requirement.\nNote:\n1. If you keeping encountering errors, unexpected situation, or you are not sure of proceeding, use RoleZero.ask_human to ask for help.\n2. Carefully review your progress at the current task, if your actions so far has not fulfilled the task instruction, you should continue with current task. Otherwise, finish current task by Plan.finish_current_task explicitly.\n3. Each time you finish a task, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to report your progress.\n4. Don\'t forget to append task first when all existing tasks are finished and new tasks are required.\n5. Avoid repeating tasks you have already completed. And end loop when all requirements are met.\nYou are an autonomous programmer\n\nThe special interface consists of a file editor that shows you 100 lines of a file at a time.\n\nYou can use terminal commands (e.g., cat, ls, cd) by calling Terminal.run_command.\n\nYou should carefully observe the behavior and results of the previous action, and avoid triggering repeated errors.\n\nIn addition to the terminal, I also provide additional tools. \n\nIf provided an issue link, you first action must be navigate to the issue page using Browser tool to understand the issue.\n\nYour must check if the repository exists at the current path. If it exists, navigate to the repository path. If the repository doesn\'t exist, please download it and then navigate to it.\nAll subsequent actions must be performed within this repository path. Do not leave this directory to execute any actions at any time.\n\nNote:\n\n1. If you open a file and need to get to an area around a specific line that is not in the first 100 lines, say line 583, don\'t just use the scroll_down command multiple times. Instead, use the Editor.goto_line command. It\'s much quicker. \n2. Always make sure to look at the currently open file and the current working directory (which appears right after the currently open file). The currently open file might be in a different directory than the working directory! Note that some commands, such as \'create\', open files, so they might change the current open file.\n3. When using Editor.edit_file_by_replace, if there is no exact match, take the difference in indentation into consideration.\n4. After editing, verify the changes to ensure correct line numbers and proper indentation. Adhere to PEP8 standards for Python code.\n5. NOTE ABOUT THE EDIT COMMAND: Indentation really matters! When editing a file, make sure to insert appropriate indentation before each line! Ensuring the code adheres to PEP8 standards. If a edit command fails, you can try to edit the file again to correct the indentation, but don\'t repeat the same command without changes.\n6. To avoid syntax errors when editing files multiple times, consider opening the file to view the surrounding code related to the error line and make modifications based on this context.\n7. Ensure to observe the currently open file and the current working directory, which is displayed right after the open file. The open file might be in a different directory than the working directory. Remember, commands like \'create\' open files and might alter the current open file.\n8. Effectively using Use search commands (`search_dir`, `search_file`, `find_file`) and navigation commands (`open_file`, `goto_line`) to locate and modify files efficiently. The Editor tool can fully satisfy the requirements. Follow these steps and considerations for optimal results:\n\n9. When the edit fails, try to enlarge the range of code.\n10. You must use the Editor.open_file command to open a file before using the Editor tool\'s edit command to modify it. When you open a file, any currently open file will be automatically closed.\n11. Remember, when you use Editor.insert_content_at_line or Editor.edit_file_by_replace, the line numbers will change after the operation. Therefore, if there are multiple operations, perform only the first operation in the current response, and defer the subsequent operations to the next turn.\n11.1 Do not use Editor.insert_content_at_line or Editor.edit_file_by_replace more than once per command list.\n12. If you choose Editor.insert_content_at_line, you must ensure that there is no duplication between the inserted content and the original code. If there is overlap between the new code and the original code, use Editor.edit_file_by_replace instead.\n13. If you choose Editor.edit_file_by_replace, the original code that needs to be replaced must start at the beginning of the line and end at the end of the line\n14. When not specified, you should write files in a folder named "{project_name}_1766888207". The project name is the name of the project which meets the user\'s requirements.\n15. When provided system design or project schedule, you MUST read them first before making a plan, then adhere to them in your implementation, especially in the programming language, package, or framework. You MUST implement all code files prescribed in the system design or project schedule.\n16. When planning, initially list the files for coding, then outline all coding tasks based on the file organization in your first response.\n17. If you plan to read a file, do not include other plans in the same response.\n18. Write only one code file each time and provide its full implementation.\n19. When the requirement is simple, you don\'t need to create a plan, just do it right away.\n20. When using the editor, pay attention to current directory. When you use editor tools, the paths must be either absolute or relative to the editor\'s current directory.\n21. When planning, consider whether images are needed. If you are developing a showcase website, start by using ImageGetter.get_image to obtain the necessary images.\n22. When planning, merge multiple tasks that operate on the same file into a single task. For example, create one task for writing unit tests for all functions in a class. Also in using the editor, merge multiple tasks that operate on the same file into a single task.\n23. When create unit tests for a code file, use Editor.read() to read the code file before planing. CommentModificationService(AgencyOperator operator) {\n        if (operator == null) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员不能为空");\n        }\n        if (!operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n   this.isOperationConfirmed = false;\n        this.isOperationCancelled = false;\n        this.isServerConnected = operator.checkServerConnection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤1：查看站点列表并选择站点。\n     * 模拟从SearchSite用例获取站点列表，并选择其中一个站点。\n     * @param sites 站点列表\n     * @param siteId 要选择的站点ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectSite(List<Site> sites, int siteId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查操作员权限\n        if (!currentOperator.canModifyComment()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：操作员未登录，无权修改评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 在站点列表中查找指定ID的站点\n        for (Site site : sites) {\n            if (site.getSiteId() == siteId) {\n                selectedSite = site;\n                System.out.println("已选择站点: " + site.getSiteName());\n                return true;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + siteId + " 的站点");\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤2和3：获取站点反馈列表并选择反馈。\n     * 上传并显示站点的反馈，然后选择其中一个反馈。\n     * @param feedbackId 要选择的反馈ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectFeedback(int feedbackId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择站点\n        if (selectedSite == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 从站点获取反馈列表\n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = selectedSite.getFeedbacks();\n        if (feedbacks.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：该站点没有反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 查找指定ID的反馈\n        Feedback feedback = selectedSite.findFeedbackById(feedbackId);\n        if (feedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + feedbackId + " 的反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        selectedFeedback = feedback;\n        System.out.println("已选择反馈: " + feedback);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：显示编辑表单并编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n     * @param newComment 新的评论内容\n     * @return 如果编辑成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean editComment(String newComment) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法编辑评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤6：验证输入的数据\n        if (!validateCommentData(newComment)) {\n            // 数据无效，激活Errored用例\n            handleErroredCase("评论数据无效或不足");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 保存原始评论以便在取消时恢复\n        String originalComment = selectedFeedback.getComment();\n        \n        // 更新评论内容\n        boolean isChanged = selectedFeedback.setComment(newComment);\n        if (!isChanged) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论内容未改变");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论已更新，等待确认...");\n        System.out.println("原始评论: " + originalComment);\n        System.out.println("新评论: " + newComment);\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证评论数据。\n     * 检查评论是否有效和充足。\n     * @param comment 要验证的评论\n     * @return 如果评论有效则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean validateCommentData(String comment) {\n        if (comment == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String trimmedComment = comment.trim();\n        if (trimmedComment.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空或只包含空白字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论长度限制\n        if (trimmedComment.length() > 1000) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论长度不能超过1000个字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否包含非法字符（示例检查）\n        if (trimmedComment.contains("<script>") || trimmedComment.contains("</script>")) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论包含潜在的安全风险内容");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：处理错误情况，激活Errored用例。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会记录错误、发送通知或执行其他错误处理逻辑。\n     * @param errorMessage 错误消息\n     */\n    private void handleErroredCase(String errorMessage) {\n        System.err.println("激活Errored用例: " + errorMessage);\n        // 在实际应用中，这里可能会：\n        // 1. 记录错误日志\n        // 2. 发送错误通知\n        // 3. 回滚任何未提交的更改\n        // 4. 重置服务状态\n        resetSelection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 用户确认要保存评论更改。\n     * @return 如果确认成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean confirmOperation() {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法确认操作");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有待确认的评论修改");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否已被修改\n        if (!selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论未被修改，无需确认");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        isOperationConfirmed = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已确认，正在保存评论更改...");\n        \n        // 步骤8：记住已更改的评论\n        rememberModifiedComment();\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：记住已更改的评论。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会将更改持久化到数据库或文件系统。\n     */\n    private void rememberModifiedComment() {\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里应该：\n            // 1. 保存到数据库\n            // 2. 更新缓存\n            // 3. 发送通知\n            \n            System.out.println("评论更改已保存到系统");\n            System.out.println("修改详情: " + selectedFeedback);\n            \n            // 重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 取消操作。\n     * 处理机构操作员取消操作的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果取消成功则返回true\n     */\n    public boolean cancelOperation() {\n        isOperationCancelled = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已取消");\n        \n        // 如果评论已被修改但未确认，恢复原始评论\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里可能需要从备份中恢复原始评论\n            System.out.println("已恢复原始评论");\n            // 注意：由于我们未保存原始评论，这里只是重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n        \n        resetSelection();\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查服务器连接状态。\n     * 处理服务器连接中断的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果服务器连接正常则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean checkServerConnection() {\n        isServerConnected = currentOperator.checkServerConnection();\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断");\n            resetSelection();\n        }\n        return isServerConnected;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 重置当前选择。\n     * 在操作完成、取消或错误时调用。\n     */\n    private void resetSelection() {\n        selectedSite = null;\n        selectedFeedback = currentOperator;\n    private CommentModificationService commentService;\n    private List<Site> availableSites;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，初始化用户界面。\n     * @param operator 当前操作员，必须已登录\n     * @param this.availableSites = sites;\n        \n        // 验证操作员权限\n        if (operator == null || !operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("操作员必须已登录才能使用评论修改功能");\n        }\n        \n        // 初始化评论修改服务\n        this.commentService = new CommentModificationService(operator);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 主菜单入口，启动评论修改流程。\n     * 遵循用例描述的事件流程顺序。\n     */\n    public void // 步骤1：查看站点列表并选择站点\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                continueProcess = step1_ViewAndSelectSite();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤2和3：显示反馈并选择反馈\n            if  continueProcess = step4and5_EditComment();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤6：验证数据并请求确认\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                continueProcess = step6_ValidateAndRequestConfirmation();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤7：确认操作\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                step7_ConfirmOperation();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤8：完成流程\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                step8_CompleteProcess();\n            }\n            \n            // 检查是否取消操作\n            if (commentService.isOperationCancelled()) {\n                System.out.println("操作已被用户取消");\n            }\n            \n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            System.err.println("发生意外错误: " + 模拟从SearchSite用例获取站点列表。\n     * @return 如果成功选择站点则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step1_ViewAndSelectSite() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤1：选择站点 ===");\n        \n        // 显示可用站点列表\n        displaySiteList();\n        \n        // 如果站点列表为空，无法继续\n        if (availableSites.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有可用的站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 获取用户输入的站点ID\n        Integer siteId = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (siteId == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            try {\n                System.out.print("请输入要选择的站点ID (输入\'cancel\'取消操作): ");\n                String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n                \n                // 检查用户是否取消操作\n                if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n                    commentService.cancelOperation();\n                    return false;\n                }\n                \n                // 验证输入是否为数字\n                siteId = Integer.parseInt(input);\n                \n                // 尝试选择站点\n                boolean success = commentService.selectSite(availableSites, siteId);\n                if (!success) {\n                    System.err.println("站点选择失败，请重试");\n                    siteId = null;\n                    attempts++;\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入有效的数字ID");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (siteId == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("站点选择成功");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 显示可用站点列表。\n     */\n    private void displaySiteList() {\n        System.out.println("可用站点列表:");\n        System.out.println("ID\\t名称\\t\\t反馈数");\n        System.out.println("--------------------------------");\n        \n */\n    private boolean step2and3_DisplayAndSelectFeedback() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤2和3：选择反馈 ===");\n        \n        Site selectedSite = commentService.getSelectedSite();\n        if @param site 要显示反馈的站点\n     */\n    private void displayFeedbackList(Site site) {\n        System.out.println("站点 \\"" + site.getSiteName() + "\\" 的反馈列表:");\n        System.out.println("ID\\t创建时间\\t\\t\\t评论预览");\n        System.out.println("------------------------------------------------------------------------");\n        \n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = site.getFeedbacks();\n        for (Feedback feedback : feedbacks) {\n            String commentPreview = feedback.getComment();\n            if (commentPreview.length() > 30) {\n                commentPreview = commentPreview.substring(0, 27) + "...";\n            }\n            \n            System.out.printf("%-6d %-20s %-30s%n",\n                feedback.getFeedbackId(),\n                feedback.getCreatedAt().toString().substring(0, 16),\n                commentPreview);\n        }\n        System.out.println();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n     * @return 如果编辑成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step4and5_EditComment() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤4和5：编辑评论 ===");\n        \n        Feedback selectedFeedback = System.out.println("----------------------------------------");\n        System.out.println("评论创建时间: " + selectedFeedback.getCreatedAt());\n        System.out.println("最后修改时间: " + 3;\n        \n        while (newComment == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.println("请输入新的评论内容 (输入\'cancel\'取消操作):");\n            System.out.println("注意：评论不能为空，长度不能超过1000字符");\n            System.out.print("> ");\n            \n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            // 检查用户是否取消操作\n            if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            }\n            \n            // 检查输入是否为空\n            if (input.isEmpty()) {\n                System.err.println("错误：评论内容不能为空");\n                attempts++;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            // 检查输入长度\n            if (input.length() > 1000) {\n                System.err.println("错误：评论长度超过1000字符限制");\n                attempts++;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            newComment = input;\n        }\n        \n        if (newComment == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 尝试编辑评论\n        boolean success = commentService.editComment(newComment);\n        if (!success) {\n            System.err.println("评论编辑失败");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论编辑完成，等待验证...");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证数据并请求确认。\n     * 系统验证输入的数据并请求用户确认更改。\n     * @return 如果验证通过且用户准备确认则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step6_ValidateAndRequestConfirmation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤6：验证和确认请求 ===");\n        \n        // 自动验证已在editComment方法中完成\n        // 这里显示确认请求\n        \n        Feedback selectedFeedback = commentService.getSelectedFeedback();\n        if (selectedFeedback == null || !selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有待确认的评论修改");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论修改验证通过！");\n        System.out.println("请确认是否保存以下更改:");\n        System.out.println("评论ID: " + selectedFeedback.getFeedbackId());\n        System.out.println("修改时间: " + selectedFeedback.getLastModifiedAt());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 请求用户确认\n        String confirmation = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (confirmation == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.print("确认保存更改吗？(yes/no/cancel): ");\n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n            \n            if (input.equals("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("no")) {\n                System.out.println("用户选择不保存更改");\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("yes")) {\n                confirmation = input;\n            } else {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入 yes, no 或 cancel");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (confirmation == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("确认收到，准备保存更改...");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 系统确认操作并保存更改。\n     */\n    private void step7_ConfirmOperation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤7：确认操作 ===");\n        \n        boolean success = commentService.confirmOperation();\n        if (!success) {\n            System.err.println("操作确认失败");\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("操作确认成功");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：完成流程。\n     * 记住已更改的评论并通知系统。\n     */\n    private void step8_CompleteProcess() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤8：完成流程 ===");\n        \n        // 检查操作是否已确认\n        if (commentService.isOperationConfirmed()) {\n            // 通知系统（在服务类中已处理）\n            commentService.notifySystem();\n            System.out.println("评论修改流程完成！");\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("评论修改未完成或未确认");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 关闭用户界面，释放资源。\n     */\n    public void close() {\n        if (scanner != null) {\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取当前的评论修改服务实例。\n     * @return 评论修改服务实例\n     */\n    public CommentModificationService getCommentService() {\n        return commentService;\n    }\n}\n\nCommand 'content': 'Command Engineer2.write_new_code executed: The file /home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/ModifyComment_1766888207/CommentModificationService.java has been successfully created, with content:\nimport java.util.List;\n\n/**\n * CommentModificationService类处理评论修改的核心业务逻辑。\n * 负责验证数据、修改评论、处理错误和确认流程。\n * 遵循用例描述的事件流程，包括数据验证、确认和错误处理。\n */\npublic class CommentModificationService {\n    private AgencyOperator currentOperator;\n    private Site selectedSite;\n    private Feedback selectedFeedback;\n    private boolean isOperationConfirmed;\n    private boolean isOperationCancelled;\n    private boolean isServerConnected;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，初始化服务。\n     * @param operator 当前操作员，必须已登录\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException 如果操作员为空或未登录\n     */\n    public CommentModificationService(AgencyOperator operator) {\n        if (operator == null) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员不能为空");\n        }\n        if (!operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员必须已登录才能执行评论修改操作");\n        }\n        this.currentOperator = operator;\n        this.selectedSite = null;\n        this.selectedFeedback = null;\n        this.isOperationConfirmed = false;\n        this.isOperationCancelled = false;\n        this.isServerConnected = operator.checkServerConnection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤1：查看站点列表并选择站点。\n     * 模拟从SearchSite用例获取站点列表，并选择其中一个站点。\n     * @param sites 站点列表\n     * @param siteId 要选择的站点ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectSite(List<Site> sites, int siteId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查操作员权限\n        if (!currentOperator.canModifyComment()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：操作员未登录，无权修改评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 在站点列表中查找指定ID的站点\n        for (Site site : sites) {\n            if (site.getSiteId() == siteId) {\n                selectedSite = site;\n                System.out.println("已选择站点: " + site.getSiteName());\n                return true;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + siteId + " 的站点");\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤2和3：获取站点反馈列表并选择反馈。\n     * 上传并显示站点的反馈，然后选择其中一个反馈。\n     * @param feedbackId 要选择的反馈ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectFeedback(int feedbackId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择站点\n        if (selectedSite == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 从站点获取反馈列表\n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = selectedSite.getFeedbacks();\n        if (feedbacks.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：该站点没有反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 查找指定ID的反馈\n        Feedback feedback = selectedSite.findFeedbackById(feedbackId);\n        if (feedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：未找到ID为 " + feedbackId + " 的反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        selectedFeedback = feedback;\n        System.out.println("已选择反馈: " + feedback);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：显示编辑表单并编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n     * @param newComment 新的评论内容\n     * @return 如果编辑成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean editComment(String newComment) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法编辑评论");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤6：验证输入的数据\n        if (!validateCommentData(newComment)) {\n            // 数据无效，激活Errored用例\n            handleErroredCase("评论数据无效或不足");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 保存原始评论以便在取消时恢复\n        String originalComment = selectedFeedback.getComment();\n        \n        // 更新评论内容\n        boolean isChanged = selectedFeedback.setComment(newComment);\n        if (!isChanged) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论内容未改变");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论已更新，等待确认...");\n        System.out.println("原始评论: " + originalComment);\n        System.out.println("新评论: " + newComment);\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证评论数据。\n     * 检查评论是否有效和充足。\n     * @param comment 要验证的评论\n     * @return 如果评论有效则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean validateCommentData(String comment) {\n        if (comment == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String trimmedComment = comment.trim();\n        if (trimmedComment.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空或只包含空白字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论长度限制\n        if (trimmedComment.length() > 1000) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论长度不能超过1000个字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否包含非法字符（示例检查）\n        if (trimmedComment.contains("<script>") || trimmedComment.contains("</script>")) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论包含潜在的安全风险内容");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：处理错误情况，激活Errored用例。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会记录错误、发送通知或执行其他错误处理逻辑。\n     * @param errorMessage 错误消息\n     */\n    private void handleErroredCase(String errorMessage) {\n        System.err.println("激活Errored用例: " + errorMessage);\n        // 在实际应用中，这里可能会：\n        // 1. 记录错误日志\n        // 2. 发送错误通知\n        // 3. 回滚任何未提交的更改\n        // 4. 重置服务状态\n        resetSelection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 用户确认要保存评论更改。\n     * @return 如果确认成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean confirmOperation() {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法确认操作");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有待确认的评论修改");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否已被修改\n        if (!selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论未被修改，无需确认");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        isOperationConfirmed = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已确认，正在保存评论更改...");\n        \n        // 步骤8：记住已更改的评论\n        rememberModifiedComment();\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：记住已更改的评论。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会将更改持久化到数据库或文件系统。\n     */\n    private void rememberModifiedComment() {\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里应该：\n            // 1. 保存到数据库\n            // 2. 更新缓存\n            // 3. 发送通知\n            \n            System.out.println("评论更改已保存到系统");\n            System.out.println("修改详情: " + selectedFeedback);\n            \n            // 重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 取消操作。\n     * 处理机构操作员取消操作的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果取消成功则返回true\n     */\n    public boolean cancelOperation() {\n        isOperationCancelled = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已取消");\n        \n        // 如果评论已被修改但未确认，恢复原始评论\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里可能需要从备份中恢复原始评论\n            System.out.println("已恢复原始评论");\n            // 注意：由于我们未保存原始评论，这里只是重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n        \n        resetSelection();\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查服务器连接状态。\n     * 处理服务器连接中断的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果服务器连接正常则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean checkServerConnection() {\n        isServerConnected = currentOperator.checkServerConnection();\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断");\n            resetSelection();\n        }\n        return isServerConnected;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 重置当前选择。\n     * 在操作完成、取消或错误时调用。\n     */\n    private void resetSelection() {\n        selectedSite = null;\n        selectedFeedback =    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取当前选择的反馈。\n     * @return 当前选择的反馈，如果未选择则返回null\n     */\n    public Feedback getSelectedFeedback() {\n        return selectedFeedback;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查操作是否已确认。\n     * @return 如果操作已确认则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean isOperationConfirmed() {\n        return isOperationConfirmed;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查操作是否已取消。\n     * @return private boolean step6_ValidateAndRequestConfirmation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤6：验证和确认请求 ===");\n        \n        // 自动验证已在editComment方法中完成\n        // 这里显示确认请求\n        \n        System.out.println("修改时间: " + selectedFeedback.getLastModifiedAt());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 请求用户确认\n        String confirmation = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (confirmation == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.print("确认保存更改吗？(yes/no/cancel): ");\n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n            \n            if (input.equals("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("no")) {\n                System.out.println("用户选择不保存更改");\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("yes")) {\n                confirmation = input;\n            } else {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入 yes, no 或 cancel");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (confirmation == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("确认收到，准备保存更改...");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 系统确认操作并保存更改。\n     */\n    private void step7_ConfirmOperation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤7：确认操作 ===");\n        \n }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤8：完成流程。\n     * 记住已更改的评论并通知系统。\n     */\n    private void step8_CompleteProcess() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤8：完成流程 ===");\n        \n        // 检查操作是否已确认\n 设置操作员名称。\n     * @param operatorName 新的操作员名称\n     */\n    public void setOperatorName(String operatorName) {\n        this.operatorName = operatorName;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查操作员是否已登录。\n && password != null && \n            !username.trim().isEmpty() && !password.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            this.isLoggedIn = true;\n            return true;\n        }\n        return false;\n CommentModificationService(AgencyOperator operator) {\n        if (operator == null) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("操作员不能为空");\n        }\n        if (!operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n * @param feedbackId 要选择的反馈ID\n     * @return 如果选择成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean selectFeedback(int feedbackId) {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择站点\n        if (selectedSite == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：请先选择站点");\n (!validateCommentData(newComment)) {\n            // 数据无效，激活Errored用例\n            handleErroredCase("评论数据无效或不足");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 保存原始评论以便在取消时恢复\n        String originalComment = selectedFeedback.getComment();\n        \n        // 更新评论内容\n        boolean isChanged = selectedFeedback.setComment(newComment);\n        if (!isChanged) {\n            System.out.println("提示：评论内容未改变");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论已更新，等待确认...");\n        System.out.println("原始评论: " + originalComment);\n        System.out.println("新评论: " + newComment);\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证评论数据。\n     * 检查评论是否有效和充足。\n     * @param comment 要验证的评论\n     * @return 如果评论有效则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean validateCommentData(String comment) {\n        if (comment == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String trimmedComment = comment.trim();\n        if (trimmedComment.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论不能为空或只包含空白字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论长度限制\n        if (trimmedComment.length() > 1000) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论长度不能超过1000个字符");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否包含非法字符（示例检查）\n        if (trimmedComment.contains("<script>") || trimmedComment.contains("</script>")) {\n            System.err.println("错误：评论包含潜在的安全风险内容");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：处理错误情况，激活Errored用例。\n     * 在实际应用中，这里可能会记录错误、发送通知或执行其他错误处理逻辑。\n     * @param errorMessage 错误消息\n     */\n    private void handleErroredCase(String errorMessage) {\n        System.err.println("激活Errored用例: " + errorMessage);\n        // 在实际应用中，这里可能会：\n        // 1. 记录错误日志\n        // 2. 发送错误通知\n        // 3. 回滚任何未提交的更改\n        // 4. 重置服务状态\n        resetSelection();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤7：确认操作。\n     * 用户确认要保存评论更改。\n     * @return 如果确认成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean confirmOperation() {\n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断，无法确认操作");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查是否已选择反馈\n        if          System.out.println("提示：评论未被修改，无需确认");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        isOperationConfirmed = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已确认，正在保存评论更改...");\n        \n rememberModifiedComment() {\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里应该：\n            // 1. 保存到数据库\n            // 2. 更新缓存\n            // 3. 发送通知\n            \n            System.out.println("评论更改已保存到系统");\n            System.out.println("修改详情: " + selectedFeedback);\n            \n            // 重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 取消操作。\n     * 处理机构操作员取消操作的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果取消成功则返回true\n     */\n    public boolean cancelOperation() {\n        isOperationCancelled = true;\n        System.out.println("操作已取消");\n        \n        // 如果评论已被修改但未确认，恢复原始评论\n        if (selectedFeedback != null && selectedFeedback.isModified()) {\n            // 在实际应用中，这里可能需要从备份中恢复原始评论\n            System.out.println("已恢复原始评论");\n            // 注意：由于我们未保存原始评论，这里只是重置修改标志\n            selectedFeedback.resetModifiedFlag();\n        }\n        \n        resetSelection();\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查服务器连接状态。\n     * 处理服务器连接中断的退出条件。\n     * @return 如果服务器连接正常则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean checkServerConnection() {\n        isServerConnected = currentOperator.checkServerConnection();\n        if (!isServerConnected) {\n            System.err.println("错误：服务器连接中断");\n            resetSelection();\n        }\n        return isServerConnected;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 重置当前选择。\n     * 在操作完成、取消或错误时调用。\n     */\n    private void resetSelection() {\n        selectedSite = null;\n        selectedFeedback = /home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/ModifyComment_1766888207/UserInterface.java has been successfully created, with content:\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Scanner;\n\n/**\n * UserInterface类提供控制台用户界面，引导用户完成评论修改的完整流程。\n * 按照用例描述的事件流程，处理站点选择、反馈选择、评论编辑和确认等步骤。\n * 包含错误处理、输入验证和用户友好的交互提示。\n */\npublic class UserInterface {\n    private Scanner scanner;\n    private AgencyOperator currentOperator;\n    private CommentModificationService commentService;\n    private List<Site> availableSites;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，初始化用户界面。\n     * @param operator 当前操作员，必须已登录\n     * @param sites 可用的站点列表\n     */\n    public UserInterface(AgencyOperator operator, List<Site> sites) {\n        this.scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n        this.currentOperator = operator;\n        this.availableSites = sites;\n        \n        // 验证操作员权限\n        if (operator == null || !operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("操作员必须已登录才能使用评论修改功能");\n        }\n        \n        // 初始化评论修改服务\n        this.commentService = new CommentModificationService(operator);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 主菜单入口，启动评论修改流程。\n     * 遵循用例描述的事件流程顺序。\n     */\n    public void startModificationProcess() {\n        System.out.println("====== 评论修改系统 ======");\n        System.out.println("欢迎，" + currentOperator.getOperatorName());\n        System.out.println("当前操作员ID: " + currentOperator.getOperatorId());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 检查服务器连接\n        if (!commentService.checkServerConnection()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：无法连接到服务器，请检查网络连接后重试");\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        try {\n            // 按照用例流程执行\n            boolean continueProcess = true;\n            \n            // 步骤1：查看站点列表并选择站点\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                continueProcess = step1_ViewAndSelectSite();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤2和3：显示反馈并选择反馈\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                continueProcess = step2and3_DisplayAndSelectFeedback();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤4和5：编辑评论\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                continueProcess = step4and5_EditComment();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤6：验证数据并请求确认\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                continueProcess = step6_ValidateAndRequestConfirmation();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤7：确认操作\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                step7_ConfirmOperation();\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤8：完成流程\n            if (continueProcess) {\n                step8_CompleteProcess();\n            }\n            \n            // 检查是否取消操作\n            if (commentService.isOperationCancelled()) {\n                System.out.println("操作已被用户取消");\n            }\n            \n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            System.err.println("发生意外错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            e.printStackTrace();\n        } finally {\n            System.out.println("====== 评论修改流程结束 ======");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤1：查看站点列表并选择站点。\n     * 模拟从SearchSite用例获取站点列表。\n     * @return 如果成功选择站点则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step1_ViewAndSelectSite() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤1：选择站点 ===");\n        \n        // 显示可用站点列表\n        displaySiteList();\n        \n        // 如果站点列表为空，无法继续\n        if (availableSites.isEmpty()) {\n            System.err.println("错误：没有可用的站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 获取用户输入的站点ID\n        Integer siteId = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (siteId == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            try {\n                System.out.print("请输入要选择的站点ID (输入\'cancel\'取消操作): ");\n                String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n                \n                // 检查用户是否取消操作\n                if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n                    commentService.cancelOperation();\n                    return false;\n                }\n                \n                // 验证输入是否为数字\n                siteId = Integer.parseInt(input);\n                \n                // 尝试选择站点\n                boolean success = commentService.selectSite(availableSites, siteId);\n                if (!success) {\n                    System.err.println("站点选择失败，请重试");\n                    siteId = null;\n                    attempts++;\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入有效的数字ID");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (siteId == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("站点选择成功");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 显示可用站点列表。\n     */\n    private void displaySiteList() {\n        System.out.println("可用站点列表:");\n        System.out.println("ID\\t名称\\t\\t反馈数");\n        System.out.println("--------------------------------");\n        \n        for (Site site : availableSites) {\n            System.out.printf("%-6d %-15s %-3d%n", \n                site.getSiteId(), \n                site.getSiteName(), \n                site.getFeedbacks().size());\n        }\n        System.out.println();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤2和3：显示反馈并选择反馈。\n     * 上传并显示站点的反馈，然后选择其中一个反馈。\n     * @return 如果成功选择反馈则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step2and3_DisplayAndSelectFeedback() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤2和3：选择反馈 ===");\n        \n        Site selectedSite = commentService.getSelectedSite();\n        if (selectedSite == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：未选择站点");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 显示站点的反馈列表\n        displayFeedbackList(selectedSite);\n        \n try {\n                System.out.print("请输入要编辑的反馈ID (输入\'cancel\'取消操作): ");\n                String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n                \n                // 检查用户是否取消操作\n                if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n                    commentService.cancelOperation();\n                    return false;\n                }\n                \n                // 验证输入是否为数字\n                feedbackId = Integer.parseInt(input);\n                \n                // 尝试选择反馈\n                boolean success = commentService.selectFeedback(feedbackId);\n                if (!success) {\n                    System.err.println("反馈选择失败，请重试");\n                    feedbackId = null;\n                    attempts++;\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入有效的数字ID");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (feedbackId == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("反馈选择成功");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 显示站点的反馈列表。\n     * @param site 要显示反馈的站点\n     */\n    private void displayFeedbackList(Site site) {\n        System.out.println("站点 \\"" + site.getSiteName() + "\\" 的反馈列表:");\n        System.out.println("ID\\t创建时间\\t\\t\\t评论预览");\n        System.out.println("------------------------------------------------------------------------");\n        \n        List<Feedback> feedbacks = site.getFeedbacks();\n        for (Feedback feedback : feedbacks) {\n            String commentPreview = feedback.getComment();\n            if (commentPreview.length() > 30) {\n                commentPreview = commentPreview.substring(0, 27) + "...";\n            }\n            \n            System.out.printf("%-6d %-20s %-30s%n",\n                feedback.getFeedbackId(),\n                feedback.getCreatedAt().toString().substring(0, 16),\n                commentPreview);\n        }\n        System.out.println();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤4和5：编辑评论。\n     * 显示当前评论并允许用户编辑。\n     * @return 如果编辑成功则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step4and5_EditComment() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤4和5：编辑评论 ===");\n        \n        Feedback selectedFeedback = commentService.getSelectedFeedback();\n        if (selectedFeedback == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：未选择反馈");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 显示当前评论\n 3;\n        \n        while (newComment == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.println("请输入新的评论内容 (输入\'cancel\'取消操作):");\n      if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            }\n            \n            // 检查输入是否为空\n            if (input.isEmpty()) {\n                System.err.println("错误：评论内容不能为空");\n                attempts++;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            // 检查输入长度\n            if (input.length() > 1000) {\n                System.err.println("错误：评论长度超过1000字符限制");\n                attempts++;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            newComment = input;\n        }\n        \n        if (newComment == null) {\n            System.err.println("错误：超过最大尝试次数，操作终止");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 尝试编辑评论\n        boolean success = commentService.editComment(newComment);\n        if (!success) {\n            System.err.println("评论编辑失败");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("评论编辑完成，等待验证...");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 步骤6：验证数据并请求确认。\n     * 系统验证输入的数据并请求用户确认更改。\n     * @return 如果验证通过且用户准备确认则返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    private boolean step6_ValidateAndRequestConfirmation() {\n        System.out.println("=== 步骤6：验证和确认请求 ===");\n        \n        // 自动验证已在editComment方法中完成\n        // 这里显示确认请求\n        \n        System.out.println("修改时间: " + selectedFeedback.getLastModifiedAt());\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        // 请求用户确认\n        String confirmation = null;\n        int attempts = 0;\n        final int maxAttempts = 3;\n        \n        while (confirmation == null && attempts < maxAttempts) {\n            System.out.print("确认保存更改吗？(yes/no/cancel): ");\n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n            \n            if (input.equals("cancel")) {\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("no")) {\n                System.out.println("用户选择不保存更改");\n                commentService.cancelOperation();\n                return false;\n            } else if (input.equals("yes")) {\n                confirmation = input;\n            } else {\n                System.err.println("错误：请输入 yes, no 或 cancel");\n                attempts++;\n            }\n If the requirement is developing a software, game, app, or website, excluding the above data-related tasks, you should decompose the requirement into multiple tasks and assign them to different team members based on their expertise. The standard software development process has four steps: creating a Product Requirement Document (PRD) by the Product Manager -> writing a System Design by the Architect -> creating tasks by the Project Manager -> and coding by the Engineer. You may choose to execute any of these steps. When publishing message to Product Manager, you should directly copy the full original user requirement.\n2.1. If the requirement contains both DATA-RELATED part mentioned in 1 and software development part mentioned in 2, you should decompose the software development part and assign them to different team members based on their expertise, and assign the DATA-RELATED part to Data Analyst David directly.\n2.2. For software development requirement, estimate the complexity of the requirement before assignment, following the common industry practice of t-shirt sizing:\n - XS: snake game, static personal homepage, basic calculator app\n - S: Basic photo gallery, basic file upload system, basic feedback form\n - M: Offline menu ordering system, news aggregator app\n - L: Online booking system, inventory management system\n - XL: Social media platform, e-commerce app, real-time multiplayer game\n - For XS and S requirements, you don\'t need the standard software development process, you may directly ask Engineer to write the code. Otherwise, estimate if any part of the standard software development process may contribute to a better final code. If so, assign team members accordingly.\n3.1 If the task involves code review (CR) or code checking, you should assign it to Engineer.\n4.
